Literature.Title: The Alzheimer's disease-associated amyloid beta-protein is an antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Soscia SJ, Kirby JE, Washicosky KJ, Tucker SM, Ingelsson M, Hyman B, Burton MA, Goldstein LE, Duong S, Tanzi RE, Moir RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>50µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>50µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19112(MIC=>50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=50µg/ml),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 12386(MIC=>50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>50µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=>50µg/ml),Streptococcus mitis ATCC 6249(MIC=>50µg/ml),Streptococcus salivarius ATCC 13419(MIC=>50µg/ml)
